2024 Annual Meeting

Posted on August 13, 2024

We are excited to announce the 2024 Annual OHBM Australia Meeting, in collaboration with the Maths in the Brain Workshop. The event will take place in person at the Kenneth Myer Building, Ian Potter Auditorium, located at 30 Royal Parade, Parkville VIC 3052, on November 7th and 8th.

Our goal is to unite the community of researchers who apply computational, mathematical, and imaging methods in neuroscience.

Program at a glance

  • Prof. Zdenka Kuncic

  • Dr. Andrew Phillips

  • Jieru Liao
  • Dr. Hamid Karimi-Rouzbahani

Poster Sessions
